item.title: How to convert ISGs into checklists
item.description: About this talk: In this session, we’ll look at how to convert an ISG into a checklist. Once in table/graph form, we can start to consume them progrematically https://nsacyber.github.io/publications.html

item.title: What are Inspection and Sanitisation Guidance (ISGs)
item.description: About this talk: In this session, we’ll look at the ISGs (Inspection and Sanitization Guidance) published by the NSA. These are standards established by the NSA. There is a ISG for each file type. Inspection and Sanitization Guidance (ISG) published by NSA https://nsacyber.github.io/publications.html For example ISG for PDF ISG for PDF Inspection and Sanitization Guidance

item.title: What security exploits are prevented by implementing ISGs
item.description: About this talk: In this session, we’ll review what exploits out there could be protected against by implementing ISGs. ISGs can be found in this publication repo: https://nsacyber.github.io/publications.html
